definition: basilar artery (central artery of the brain)

sentences.english: Spontanous subarachnoid hemorrhage ( SAH) mostly arises from rupture and bleeding of intracranial aneurysms.
sentences.chinese: 自发性蛛网膜下腔出血多是由于颅内动脉瘤破裂引起。

sentences.english: Investigations led to the diagnosis and treatment of subclavian artery stenosis.
sentences.chinese: 检查明确锁骨下动脉狭窄的诊断和治疗。

sentences.english: Finally they were confirmed by DSA or MRI.
sentences.chinese: 后经DSA或MRI确诊为颈动脉海绵窦瘘。

sentences.english: Objective Observation on arterial distribution of conus arteriosus.
sentences.chinese: 目的动脉圆锥的动脉解剖学观察。

sentences.english: Objective Observation on arterial distribution of conus arteriosus.
sentences.chinese: 目的动脉圆锥的动脉解剖学观察。

sentences.english: The accident of aortic cannulation is very dangerous and the mortality of this complication is quite high.
sentences.chinese: 主动脉插管意外极为凶险，死亡率非常高。

sentences.english: The emboli are divided into 4 kinds according to the shapes.
sentences.chinese: 根据肺动脉内栓子形态分4类。

sentences.english: How many cusps are there supposed to be on this pulmonic valve.
sentences.chinese: 你认为这个肺动脉瓣有多少个瓣叶？

sentences.english: The ramus colla teralis is absent in the anterior me, enteric artery.
sentences.chinese: 肠系膜前动脉不分出侧副支。

sentences.english: For arteriosus truncus and its branches, ultrasonography detection is not difficult.
sentences.chinese: 主干带小分支型皮瓣轴心动脉超声显像不难。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the application of continuous suture in aortic valve replacement.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨主动脉瓣置换中连续缝合方法的应用。

sentences.english: The vessels of vascular pedicles were anastomosed to the femoral artery and the branches of saphenous vein.
sentences.chinese: 皮瓣血管蒂分刖与股动脉及大隐静脉吻合。

sentences.english: Most commonly the narrowing occurs at the pulmonary valve.
sentences.chinese: 最常见的狭窄部位为肺动脉瓣。

sentences.english: To explore the feasibility of ligating and embedding a pump in the iliac artery by laparoscopic.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨腹腔镜髂内动脉结扎及置泵可行性。

sentences.english: Conclusion The prognosis of PHT secondary to rheumatic diseases is pessimistic.
sentences.chinese: 结论风湿性疾病继发肺动脉高压预后不良。

sentences.english: Results The blood supply of uterine myoma was occluded while both uterine arteries were embolized.
sentences.chinese: 结果栓塞双侧子宫动脉后，子宫肌瘤血供可完全阻断。

definition: main artery (blood vessel)/fig. main highway/arterial road
